Beklenen: select count(*) as count from customers
Üretilen: select count(*) as count from customers

Beklenen: select count(*) as count from orders where date_trunc('month', orders.created_at) = date_trunc('month', current_date)
Üretilen: select count(*) as count from orders where date_trunc('month', orders.created_at) = date_trunc('month', current_date)

Beklenen: select count(*) as count from orders where orders.created_at >= current_date - interval '3 months'
Üretilen: select count(*) as count from orders where orders.created_at >= current_date - interval '3 months'

Soru: bu yıl kaç farklı müşteri sipariş verdi
Beklenen: select count(distinct customer_id) as count from orders where extract(year from orders.created_at) = extract(year from current_date)
Üretilen: select count(distinct customer_id) as count from orders where extract(year from orders.created_at) = extract(year from current_date)

Soru: bu yıl kaç müşteri en az 1 sipariş verdi
Beklenen: select count(distinct customer_id) as count from orders where extract(year from orders.created_at) = extract(year from current_date)
Üretilen: select count(distinct customer_id) as count from orders where extract(year from orders.created_at) = extract(year from current_date)

Soru: 2025 te son 3 ayda kaç sipariş var
Beklenen: select count(*) as count from orders where orders.created_at >= current_date - interval '3 months' and extract(year from orders.created_at) = 2025
Üretilen: select count(*) as count from orders where orders.created_at >= current_date - interval '3 months' and extract(year from orders.created_at) = 2025

Soru: bu yıl kaç müşteri kayıt oldu
Beklenen: select count(*) as count from customers where extract(year from customers.created_at) = extract(year from current_date)
Üretilen: select count(*) as count from customers where extract(year from customers.created_at) = extract(year from current_date)

Soru: bu ay kaç farklı ürün satıldı
Beklenen: select count(distinct order_items.product_id) as count from order_items join orders on order_items.order_id = orders.id where date_trunc('month', orders.created_at) = date_trunc('month', current_date)
Üretilen: select count(distinct order_items.product_id) as count from order_items join orders on order_items.order_id = orders.id where date_trunc('month', orders.created_at) = date_trunc('month', current_date)

Soru: bu ay toplam kaç ürün satıldı
Beklenen: select count(*) as count from order_items join orders on order_items.order_id = orders.id where date_trunc('month', orders.created_at) = date_trunc('month', current_date)
Üretilen: select count(*) as count from order_items join orders on order_items.order_id = orders.id where date_trunc('month', orders.created_at) = date_trunc('month', current_date)

Soru: bu yıl toplam sipariş tutarı ne kadar
Beklenen: select coalesce(sum(orders.total_amount), 0) as total_sum from orders where extract(year from orders.created_at) = extract(year from current_date)
Üretilen: select coalesce(sum(orders.total_amount), 0) as total_sum from orders where extract(year from orders.created_at) = extract(year from current_date)

Soru: 2025 martta toplam sipariş tutarı ne kadar
Beklenen: select coalesce(sum(orders.total_amount), 0) as total_sum from orders where extract(month from orders.created_at) = 3 and extract(year from orders.created_at) = 2025
Üretilen: select coalesce(sum(orders.total_amount), 0) as total_sum from orders where extract(month from orders.created_at) = 3 and extract(year from orders.created_at) = 2025

Soru: bu ay toplam gelir ne kadar
Beklenen: select coalesce(sum(orders.total_amount), 0) as total_sum from orders where date_trunc('month', orders.created_at) = date_trunc('month', current_date)
Üretilen: select coalesce(sum(orders.total_amount), 0) as total_sum from orders where date_trunc('month', orders.created_at) = date_trunc('month', current_date)

Beklenen: select to_char(orders.created_at, 'yyyy-mm') as donem, coalesce(sum(orders.total_amount), 0) as total_sum from orders group by donem order by donem
Üretilen: select to_char(orders.created_at, 'yyyy-mm') as donem, coalesce(sum(orders.total_amount), 0) as total_sum from orders group by donem order by donem

Soru: müşterilere göre toplam harcama ne kadar
Beklenen: select customers.name, coalesce(sum(orders.total_amount), 0) as total_sum from orders join customers on orders.customer_id = customers.id group by customers.name order by 2 desc
Üretilen: select customers.name, coalesce(sum(orders.total_amount), 0) as total_sum from orders join customers on orders.customer_id = customers.id group by customers.name order by 2 desc

Beklenen: select * from customers order by customers.created_at asc limit 5
Üretilen: select * from customers order by customers.created_at asc limit 5

Beklenen: select * from customers order by customers.created_at desc limit 3
Üretilen: select * from customers order by customers.created_at desc limit 3

Beklenen: select * from orders order by orders.created_at asc limit 5
Üretilen: select * from orders order by orders.created_at asc limit 5

Beklenen: select name from customers limit 10
Üretilen: select name from customers limit 10

Soru: 10000 tl üzeri harcama yapan müşterileri listele
Beklenen: select customers.name, sum(orders.total_amount) as toplam from orders join customers on orders.customer_id = customers.id group by customers.name having sum(orders.total_amount) > 10000 order by toplam desc limit 10
Üretilen: select customers.name, sum(orders.total_amount) as toplam from orders join customers on orders.customer_id = customers.id group by customers.name having sum(orders.total_amount) > 10000 order by toplam desc limit 10

Beklenen: select to_char(orders.created_at, 'yyyy-mm') as donem, count(*) as siparis_sayisi from orders group by donem order by donem
Üretilen: select to_char(orders.created_at, 'yyyy-mm') as donem, count(*) as siparis_sayisi from orders group by donem order by donem

Beklenen: select orders.total_amount, customers.name, orders.created_at from orders join customers on orders.customer_id = customers.id limit 10
Üretilen: select * from customers limit 10
